What is (are) Juvenile ossifying fibroma ?,"Juvenile ossifying fibroma (JOF) is rare, benign tumor of the craniofacial (skull and face) bones. It is considered a ""fibro-osseous neoplasm"" because it is characterized by an overgrowth of bone. Affected people generally experience a gradual o
